channel.title: Python-Programming on Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童
channel.description: Recent content in Python-Programming on Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童

item.title: Decision Tree: How to find the path from the root to the desired terminal node
item.description: Find terminal nodes in each tree of the built random forest that give the largest prediction. Then find paths from root to these selected terminal nodes and ensemble them to derive a decision region.
